title: Error Detection & Correction
subject: Computer Networks
theory:
Bits flip due to noise. We need to know.
- **Detection**: CRC (Cyclic Redundancy Check) is standard. Uses Polynomial division.
- **Correction**: Hamming Code (Adds redundancy bits). Expensive.

examples.code:
Data: 101, Parity: 1 (Even)
Sent: 1011. Rcvd: 1001. Parity check fails.
